channel.title: Looking for a proffesional webdev
channel.description:
looking for a professional webdev for our server, willing to pay if needed
If you have any websites you have made in the past please post them here so i can see how good you are.
Post your skype names here if you would be interested in being a webdev.

item.title: Looking for a proffesional webdev
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“termz, post:1, topic:537938”]view a site im working on right now.

http://76.125.10.124/[/quote]

Honestly can’t tell if you’re trolling or not.

Here comes the list:
No doctype declared.
Tables are used for styling.
Interal and external CSS used.
Use of multiple deprecated tags and attributes: e.g and BGCOLOR.
You include the CSS file 3 times.
You declare html, head and body tags 3 times.

That’s just quickly scanning over the document, seriously? If this side is that bad I wouldn’t want to see the backend.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a proffesional webdev
item.dc:creator: @termz termz
item.description:
@termz wrote:

thanks, i cant bring myself away from the old days.

item.title: Looking for a proffesional webdev
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You can’t offer any kind of payment here, help is free. I suggest you remove it from the OP before a mod comes and gets rid of it.
